snoopy.blindnote: ホスト:Homo_sapiens100285->Homo_sapiens100552-> Homo_sapiens100553 (20100707末安)UCSCを参考にgenomic positionを変更した,NCBIを参考にaccession Noを加えた,evidenceはsnoRNAbaseのレファレンスから抜粋。
snoopy.evidence: Runte, M., Huttenhofer, A., Gross, S., Kiefmann, M., Horsthemke, B., and Buiting, K. (2001). The IC-SNURF-SNRPN transcript serves as a host for multiple small nucleolar RNA species and as an antisense RNA for UBE3A. Hum Mol Genet, 10, 2687-2700. Cavaille, J., Buiting, K., Kiefmann, M., Lalande, M., Brannan, C. I., Horsthemke, B., Bachellerie, J. P., Brosius, J., and Huttenhofer, A. (2000). Identification of brain-specific and imprinted small nucleolar RNA genes exhibiting an unusual genomic organization. Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A, 97, 14311-14316.
